栫字的基本解释

栫
jiàn
（用柴木）堵塞：“囚诸楼台，栫之以棘。”
篱笆。

栫
zùn
古书上说的一种树。

栫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》在甸切，去霰，從。］
用柴木围堵。

栫字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栫； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页523第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【類篇】?徂悶切，音鐏。【說文】以柴木壅水。亦木名。　又【唐韻】【正韻】在甸切【集韻】【韻會】才殿切，?音荐。捕魚具。【郭璞·江賦】栫澱爲涔。見橬註。　又【博雅】地籬也。【廣韻】圍也。【左傳·哀八年】囚諸樓臺，栫之以棘。　又司馬光曰：栫，徂門切，音存。今《集韻》不收。

考證：〔【郭璞·江賦】洊澱爲涔。〕　謹照原文洊改栫。〔【左傳·襄十年】囚諸樓臺，栫之以棘。〕　謹照原文襄十年改哀八年。
栫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
栫字的起名意思

暂无。

栫
Basic explanation of words
栫
jiàn
(With firewood) Blocking up: "Prison all towers, thorns."
fence.
栫
zùn
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
栫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guangyun" is cutting in Dian, go to ha, follow. ]
Contain with firewood.
栫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栫; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 523 No. 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Distressed cut, sound ya. [Said the text] Retain water with firewood and wood. Yimu name.　 [Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] cut in Dian [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] before the Dian cut,? Yin recommended. Fishing gear. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Wei Dian is 涔. See note.　[Bo Ya] The fence is also. [Guang Yun] Wai Ye. [Zuo Zhuan·Eight Years of Amour] Prisoners of all towers, thorns.　Sima Guang said: Chi, Chumenqi, and the sound is stored. "Ji Yun" is not accepted today. Textual research: [[Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Wei Dian is 涔. 〕　I would like to change it according to the original text. [[Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Ten Years] Prisoners of all towers, thorns. 〕 　 I would like to change the ten years to eight years according to the original text.
